resources.string: A simple, lightning fast and easy one click backup / restore of your phone contact\'s to any device anytime, anywhere."
Contact Backup File not found in "Downloads" folder of your device. Backup your contact again!!
Please input last 4 digit unique code from backup URL.
All contacts restored on this phone successfully.
Please allow storage permissions, so "RECALL" can access your contact backup file.
Please allow storage permissions in settings, so "RECALL" can access your contact backup file.
Tap on whatsapp icon to send this link to restoring device or Just copy below code & paste in the device where you wish to restore your contacts!!
Upload your contact file by clicking below :
Are you sure, you want to restore contacts on this device?
RECALL requires contacts permission to backup your contacts. \nPlease allow them in settings.
RECALL requires contacts & storage permissions to backup your contacts. \nPlease allow them in settings.
RECALL requires contacts permission to restore your contacts. \nPlease allow them in settings.
RECALL requires contacts & storage permissions to restore your contacts. \nPlease allow them in settings.
Please provide access of your contact permissions, so we can read and store contact backup of your device.
Thank You for using RECALL. \nAll contacts are restored on this phone successfully. \nWe require your support, please rate us on play-store.
RECALL requires an active internet connection to work.
Restore all your contact by pressing below :
Share this contact file over email / social channels in the restoring device.
Backup failed due to unknown reason, Try later!!
Cannot restore contact due to unknown reason, Try later!!
Not an valid authorised backup link, Try again!!
No contact\'s found on this device for backing up.
Contact backup not found associated with this link, try restore using contact file.
Contact backup file not found in download folder. \nMake sure "contact_backup.txt" file exist in your "Phone Storage -> Download" folder.

"Thank you for using RECALL 
Steps to restore your contacts : 
1. Install RECALL app on other device. 
2. Click on below Link. 
3. Tap on confirm button and done!! 
Your Contact Backup ->"
You have already restored your contact\'s on this device. Restoring again will result in duplicate contact\'s. \nAre you sure, you wish to restore?
